alert.note: Alert for Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 9:35PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walker and Dade Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 934 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Stephensville, or near Trenton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Chickamauga, Chattanooga Valley, Cole City, Wildwood, Stephensville, Chattanooga Valley, New England, Morganville, Cloudland Canyon State Park, Cooper Heights, and Fairview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
